attributes.action: Tell the government to stop the postcode lotteries for fertility treatment.
attributes.additional_details: NICE has recommended that three cycles of infertility treatment should be offered, this may increase a persons chances of conceiving.
attributes.background: Fertility treatment is a disease of the reproductive system which 1in6 people suffer with in the uk. Unfortunately treatment is not standardised across the uk with different areas offering different eligibility criteria.
